column1: Congratulations David! I’m proud to call you a friend and even prouder of the extraordinary work you do on behalf of your district. A well deserved victory by you and your campaign.   Tremendous job (again!) by @tomemmer @NRCC @CAGOP on flipping another seat! https://t.co/ZHCEIFbpWu
